CookieConsentText: By continuing to browse this site, you accept our use of cookies.
CookieConsentLearnMorePage:
System cookies:
They are strictly necessary for the use of the website. They allow minimal functionality such as the use of translations and content presentation.

Description.Title: Printing Art
Description.Content_1: Activcopy is a graphic and printing services company operating in the market over the last 40 years. We have good professionals and high quality equipment and materials, because without them we cannot transpose our quality and commitment to the service we provide.
Description.Content_2: We prioritize good and careful service to our customers, in order to provide a complete,
Description.Content_9: , so we have vegan paper available, and also FSC (forest management) certified paper. In large format printing we use water-based inks that are certified by WELL Green Guard Gold, which means the ink does not have odors and therefore can be used indoors.
Description.Content_16: , and also special prices for students.
Description.Content_17: At the moment Activcopy intends to expand its digital and graphic design services.
Description.Content_18: Do not hesitate to contact us!

OrderCompleted.ThankYou: Obrigado pela preferência, a sua encomenda irá ser processada.
OrderCompleted.Info:
Foi enviado um e-mail com todas as informações relativas à compra, assim como todos os dados necessários para efetuar o pagamento.
O pagamento deverá ser efetuado num prazo de 48h via transferência bancária.
